type ExtenderControl = class inherit Control interface IExtenderControl

summary.span: 对于扩展程序控件提供一个抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for an extender control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可让你以编程方式将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 服务器控件。The class enables you to programmatically add AJAX functionality to an ASP.NET server control. 从 类继承并实现 接口。The inherits from the class and implements the interface. 类定义所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件共享的属性、方法和事件。The class defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls. 接口是抽象类，不能直接对其进行实例化。The interface is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. 而是创建派生类型。Instead, you create a derived type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example shows how to use the class. 有关与此示例相关的教程，请参阅 [创建扩展器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55)。For a tutorial related to this example, see [Creating an Extender Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55).

summary.span: 引发 事件，并将扩展程序脚本控件注册到 控件。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the extender control with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发基类的事件后，该 方法会向控件注册扩展程序控件 。After the event of the base class is raised, the method registers the extender control with the control.
